## 1) Load the libraries 
```{r}
library("tidyverse")
library("palmerpenguins")
penguins
```

## 2) dimentions 
```{r}
dim(penguins)
```

## 3) names 
```{r}
names(penguins)
```

## 4) Individuals per Island 
```{r}
penguins <- penguins
table(penguins$island)
#summary(penguins$island)
```

## 5) mass of all penguins 
```{r}
mean(penguins$body_mass_g , na.rm = T)
```
